column1: Uchi////I thought it wasn't going to be filling
column2: but we were talking to our sushi chef at the bar and we received 2 other dishes on the house!!! I love sitting at the sushi bar! We also talked to the chefs about how they work at different stations and their experiences with food. And
column3: two of them are working on some new costumes for a cosplay convention :) He encouraged us to get a little bit of all the components in each bite. Everything is there for a reason and I love tasting all the different savory/sweet/salty flavors with a crunchy texture.
